abstract.t: This document defines a strategy to securely assign a pledge to an owner, using an artifact signed, directly or indirectly, by the pledge's manufacturer. This artifact is known as a "voucher". The voucher artifact is a YANG-defined JSON document that has been signed using a PKCS#7 structure. The voucher artifact is generated by the pledge's manufacture or delegate (i.e. the MASA). This document only defines the voucher artifact, leaving it to other documents to describe specialized protocols for accessing it.
